title: ProtonMail revamps ‘Bridge’ utility for using third-party mail apps
content:
ProtonMail is an end-to-end encrypted email service, adding an extra layer of security on top of traditional email messaging. The additional security features means you can’t connect a ProtonMail account to a third-party email application, like you can with Gmail or Yahoo accounts. The post ProtonMail revamps ‘Bridge’ utility for using third-party mail apps appeared first on xda-developers.
description: ProtonMail Bridge, the utility for using ProtonMail email accounts with third-party desktop email apps, is receiving an overhaul.
